Sat Jul 24 13:20:02 EDT 2010
    getting package to actually install.
Tue Sep 14 20:05:11 EDT 2010
    Color sets are now in different files, one each for resene, css3, and
    html4. css3 is a superset of html4. The user is now required to either
    choose an existing set, or provide a csv file of their own for matching when
    calling namethatcolor.
